lemma exception_step_def_raw: "exception_step = (\<lambda>P a h (stk, loc, C, M, pc) frs. case match_ex_table P (cname_of h a) pc (ex_table_of P C M) of None \<Rightarrow> (\<lfloor>a\<rfloor>, h, frs) | Some (pc', d) \<Rightarrow> (None, h, (Addr a # drop (size stk - d) stk, loc, C, M, pc') # frs))"
